comments.body: Assigned to Rahul and Amir
Adding comment is mandatory
Adding comment is mandatory

8th July - Worked on PHM Admin side slider bugs. Completed fixing the bugs. Sent updated User side code to client.

Attended - Call with Chander and discussed datepicker updates and assumptions.

Worked On - Completed Acuity graph filter implementation and bug fixes. Updated code to the client

Worked On - Tab based navigation feasibility check. Did R&D and started implement the solution. Updated code with the client.
Worked on PHM care plan hub datepicker and inline datepicker issues and tooltip issues

Worked On - Tab based navigation. Made changes based on client requirement:

* The first input field is not in focus once the page loads.
* Hitting enter opens the dropdown.
* Arrow key navigation within the list ( in progress )
* Pressing tabs navigates through the open items.

Attended - Client call and discussed existing code and new requirements.
Worked on care plan hub datepicker updates and other tooltip changes

Worked on - Implemented tab  based navigation to the drop down and implemented opening of PHM hub based on key interactions.



Attended - Call with Vikram and team to discuss integration related queries and concerns

A> Worked on - Finding and removing duplicate CSS classes. Started commenting the controller methods based on its relevance. - In progress.

1.10ewidget.css conflict issue - *In progress*

2.fonts - which fonts we need to consider ? *Done*

3.sepration of controller with comments  *In progress*

4.All the classes in CSS are in used or not and wrapper class *– Done*

B> Attended - Client call with Chander, bi weekly touch base meeting.
Worked on care plan hub changes
Worked on care plan hub changes mentioned by client

1.10ewidget.css conflict issue  - +Created a separate file widget-wrapper.css with a wrapper class. You can remove 10e widget dependency.+

2.fonts - which fonts we need to consider - +You need to add the folder \\assets\\fonts\\hra and \\assets\\fonts\\phm as they are being used.+

3.sepration of controller with comments  - +Have added proper comments to indicate which module the code belongs to.+

4.All the classes in CSS are in use or not and wrapper class -- +Added wrapper class wherever it was missing.+





Chander requirement:



* HRA – dropdown doesn’t open at click of the down button to the extreme right corner *- Done*
* HRA Green checkmark icon doesn’t display when HRA is selected *- Done*
* HRA name … is not implemented if the name is long.
* If the name is too long it should show … and on hover over display the complete name. *- Done*
* This .. interaction should be working on both views of the Work queue – “sort by status’ and ‘sort by date. *- Done*
Worked on care plan hub changes mentioned by client

* Implemented the tooltip for each assessment
* Made progress in tab navigation
* Fixed a few UI bugs.

* Fixed UI Bugs
